subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Blackhawks, who overcame a slide in the second half of the season, took a 1-0 lead on Friday night in their second-round series against the Minnesota Wild.
snippet: The Blackhawks, who overcame a slide in the second half of the season, took a 1-0 lead on Friday night in their second-round series against the Minnesota Wild.
